verbs.description: [ARG0: pittsburgh paper] [V: puts] [ARG1: jewish mourners prayer] [ARG2: on front page] [ARGM-PRP: to honor synagogue shooting victims] the pittsburgh post - gazette put the opening words of the kaddish a traditional jewish mourners prayer on the front page of its newspaper on friday to honor the victims of the synagogue shooting robert bowers squirrel hill anti defamation league pittsburgh pittsburgh post - gazette united states tree of life synagogue paper anti - defamation league getty pittsburgh america
